messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Email list for kids
messages.msgSnippet: I made a list for my children in mind to meat with other home schooled children. It is not specifically for unschoolers. It is for children who learn at home.
messages.messageBody:
I made a list for my children in mind to meat with other home schooled
children. It is not specifically for unschoolers. It is for children who
learn at home.
It is moderated by me and the parent has to send me a letter that they want
their children signed up. This way we could screen unwanted people on the
list.
The list is quite now but I think because we have not many children on
board.

Here is the URL
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Cool_Hs-ed_Kids/?yguid=134242978

Timea
Mom to Daniel 02-20-91, Christian 02-20-91, Thomas 12-25-97, Michael
07-04-02
in Innisfil (Churchill), Ontario

messages.subject: Email list for kids
messages.msgSnippet: My daughter, Lanora, is looking for an email list for unschooled kids.  She is 13 and really wants to meet more kids who come from the same mindset and freedom
messages.messageBody:
My daughter, Lanora, is looking for an email list for unschooled kids. She is 13 and really wants to meet more kids who come from the same mindset and freedom that she has.

I know I've heard at least one such type of list mentioned here but couldn't find it by searching the web. If someone could help point us in the right direction it would be much appreciated.

Kris

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
